channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon’s Alexa chief predicts an end to doom scrolling: the next generation is ‘going to just think differently’
item.description: "You've got to make sure you have products in their pockets, on their bodies, in their homes that they don't expect," Panos Panay said at Brainstorm A...

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg gifted noise-canceling headphones to his Palo Alto neighbors because of the nonstop construction around his 11 homes
item.description: This isn’t the first time Zuckerberg has clashed with neighbors over real estate projects.

item.title: Elon Musk Is Playing A Different Entrepreneurial Game
item.description: Elon Musk’s edge isn’t cars or rockets. It’s Starlink—a global communications network reshaping telecom economics and redefining entrepreneurial scale...

item.title: Are You Having A Sad Christmas? Here Are 12 Reasons It May Be Bad
item.description: If you are having a sad "Blue Christmas" or a bad December holiday season in any other way, you are not alone. There are 12 reasons why this may be th...

item.title: Jack in the Box shut down more than 70 stores with more expected by year's end over financial struggles
item.description: Jack in the Box is closing dozens of restaurants as part of a major cost-cutting plan, with 72 locations shuttered so far and more expected in the nea...

item.title: Meet the millionaires living the ‘underconsumption’ life: They drive secondhand cars, batch cook, and never buy new clothes
item.description: From thrifted clothes to no gifts at the holidays, these millionaires are living an 'underconsumption' life which has opened up financial freedom.

item.title: Logan Paul auctions off $5.3 million Pokémon card, urging young people to invest more in nontraditional assets: ‘Don’t be afraid to take a risk’
item.description: Pokémon cards have seen the largest long-term increase in value among all card categories.

item.title: Gen Z founder on ‘AI anxiety’ and being pigeonholed as generation shortcut: that’s the ‘biggest misconception’
item.description: "We don't really know what to do but we know it's coming and nobody is moving as fast to solve the problem," said Kiara Nirghin. AI or climate anxiety...

item.title: $400k shipment of live lobsters hijacked en route to Midwest Costco locations
item.description: The FBI is investigating the theft of a $400,000 lobster delivery bound for Costco locations in Illinois and Minnesota that was allegedly hijacked.

item.title: Why All I Want For Christmas Is A Dolby Atmos-Equipped Polestar 3
item.description: Dolby Atmos inside a car is a transformative experience and thanks to Polestar your favorite Christmas songs have now been optimised for the format.

item.title: Google To Let Users Change Gmail Address — What You Need To Know
item.description: A Google support document has revealed that Gmail users will soon be able to change their @gmail.com email address.

item.title: Google Notebook Rolls Out Lecture Mode With British Flair
item.description: NotebookLM’s audio overviews evolved into interactive podcasts and upcoming lecture mode, expanding passive learning possibilities.

item.title: Michael Bublé is coming for Mariah Carey’s Christmas-music crown

Holiday barks sold at Aldi recalled over potential undeclared pecans, wheat: FDA
item.description: Silvestri Sweets recalled Choceur-branded holiday bark sold at Aldi stores after a packaging mix-up led to undeclared allergens in the popular treats.

item.title: Mortgage rates fall ahead of Christmas holiday
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.18%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Wednesday. That is down fro...

item.title: S&P 500 hits record high on Christmas Eve for first time in more than a decade

S&P 500 closes at fresh record high in holiday-shortened session
Where you can shop for your last-minute Christmas needs
item.description: Need last-minute holiday essentials? Find out which major retailers like Target have modified hours on Christmas Eve and will close for the holiday.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
